text: KBHN (89.7 FM) is a radio station broadcasting a Contemporary Christian format. Branded as 89.7 The Word and licensed to Booneville, Arkansas, United States, it serves the Ft. Smith Radio area. The station is currently owned by Vision Ministries, Inc.. ==External links== * * * BHN Category:Contemporary Christian radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1997 BHN
title: KBHN
